altername_name: Fit in Six: Karada o Kitaeru 6-tsu no Youso
name: Fit in Six
overview: Developed by Ubisoft Blue Byte studio, the game separates overall fitness routines into six core elements - core body, upper body, lower body, cardio, balance and flexibility - that help you focus on getting fit and reaching your goals. The workouts have been developed by experienced fitness professionals to ensure that every move is performed precisely and effectively.
